thread.title: How to Get to Mars ... And Maybe Even Live There
thread.title_full: How to Get to Mars ... And Maybe Even Live There

title: How to Get to Mars ... And Maybe Even Live There
text:
How to Get to Mars ... And Maybe Even Live There By Wired 
There's something about the Red Planet—so close yet so far, inhospitable yet perhaps not totally uninhabitable—that keeps us dreaming about getting there one day.
